This row shows that Carlos De Toro was appointed on January 16, 2009, not December 29, 2008.

So, putting this together, the first part of the claim is true—Daniel Ubeti was sacked on December 29, 2008. However, the second part is false because he wasn't replaced by Carlos De Toro that same day; instead, he was replaced by Nelson Ancheta.
